programs.title: Youth Education Grant
programs.description: Financial assistance for post-secondary education expenses
programs.content: This program provides up to $5,000 per academic year to help cover tuition, books, and living expenses for eligible students.

programs.title: First-Time Entrepreneur Fund
programs.description: Seed funding for young business owners
programs.content: Provides up to $10,000 in seed funding plus mentorship opportunities for young entrepreneurs starting their first business.

programs.title: Youth Housing Support
programs.content: Monthly rental subsidies and housing placement services for youth facing homelessness or unstable living situations.
